timeline.bodyText: That looks like the wrong year for a new file
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: This is just a renamed file.
replies.author: hmottestad

timeline.bodyText: Why are you wrapping this in an Arraylist?
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: Arrays.asList is immutable and I need mutability.
replies.author: hmottestad

timeline.bodyText: Same here - why is this needed? It looks redundant.
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

timeline.bodyText: While these tests (after reading back and forth a bit) seem sensible, I'm a bit lost on what this has to do with issue GH-1574. Did the fix you added change ordering behavior somehow?
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: Ordering test is a renamed file where I’ve moved in some old tests and also added one that checks that the set used to store the target nodes is sorted. Which is an assumption used further down the line.
replies.author: hmottestad

timeline.message:
GH-1574 added comments to help next developer
